TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit BinaryWriter extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 将二进制中的基元类型写入流并支持用特定的编码写入字符串。

span.span: Writes primitive types in binary to a stream and supports writing strings in a specific encoding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了简化基元数据类型写入流的方法。The class provides methods that simplify writing primitive data types to a stream. 例如，你可以使用方法将一个布尔值写入一个单字节值形式的流。For example, you can use the method to write a Boolean value to the stream as a one-byte value. 类包含支持不同的数据类型的写入方法。The class includes write methods that support different data types. 当你创建的新实例类，提供要写入的流并 （可选） 指定的编码类型以及是释放后是否保持流处于打开对象。When you create a new instance of the class, you provide the stream to write to, and optionally specify the type of encoding and whether to leave the stream open after disposing the object. 如果未指定编码类型，则使用 utf-8。If you do not specify an encoding type, UTF-8 is used. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用实现 IDisposable 的对象"部分接口主题。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 派生的类可以重写此类使唯一字符编码的方法。A derived class can override the methods of this class to give unique character encodings. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何存储和检索文件中的应用程序设置。The following code example demonstrates how to store and retrieve application settings in a file. [!code-csharp[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter/VB/source.vb#1)]

abstract member Close : unit -> unit override this.Close : unit -> unit

summary.span: 关闭当前的 和基础流。

span.span: Closes the current and the underlying stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现的`Close`调用方法并传递`true`值。This implementation of `Close` calls the method passing a `true` value. 刷新流将不会刷新其基础的编码器，除非你明确地调用或`Close`。Flushing the stream will not flush its underlying encoder unless you explicitly call or `Close`. 设置到`true`意味着数据从缓冲区刷新到流中，但不是会刷新编码器状态。Setting to `true` means that data will be flushed from the buffer to the stream, but the encoder state will not be flushed. 这将允许编码器，以便它可以正确编码的字符的下一步块保持其状态 （部分字符）。This allows the encoder to keep its state (partial characters) so that it can encode the next block of characters correctly. 这种情况下会影响 UTF8 和 UTF7 其中某些字符仅后才能进行编码的编码器收到的相邻字符。This scenario affects UTF8 and UTF7 where certain characters can only be encoded after the encoder receives the adjacent character or characters.

summary.span: 清理当前编写器的所有缓冲区，使所有缓冲数据写入基础设备。

span.span: Clears all buffers for the current writer and causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有的派生的类应重写`Flush`以确保所有缓冲的数据被发送到流。All derived classes should override `Flush` to ensure that all buffered data is sent to the stream. 刷新流将不会刷新其基础的编码器，除非你明确地调用`Flush`或。Flushing the stream will not flush its underlying encoder unless you explicitly call `Flush` or . 设置到`true`意味着数据从缓冲区刷新到流中，但不是会刷新编码器状态。Setting to `true` means that data will be flushed from the buffer to the stream, but the encoder state will not be flushed. 这将允许编码器，以便它可以正确编码的字符的下一步块保持其状态 （部分字符）。This allows the encoder to keep its state (partial characters) so that it can encode the next block of characters correctly. 这种情况下会影响 UTF8 和 UTF7 其中某些字符仅后才能进行编码的编码器收到的相邻字符。This scenario affects UTF8 and UTF7 where certain characters can only be encoded after the encoder receives the adjacent character or characters. 通用 I/O 任务的列表，请参阅[通用 I/O 任务](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于数据格式设置冲突，不建议对以下编码方式使用此方法：Because of data formatting conflicts, using this method with the following encodings is not recommended: - UTF-7UTF-7 - ISO-2022-JPISO-2022-JP - ISCIIISCII 通用 I/O 任务的列表，请参阅[通用 I/O 任务](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何编写二进制数据作为后备存储，使用内存，然后验证数据是否被正确写入。The following code example shows how to write binary data using memory as a backing store, and then verify that the data was written correctly. summary.span: 将 Unicode 字符写入当前流，并根据所使用的 和向流中写入的特定字符，提升流的当前位置。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于数据格式设置冲突，不建议对以下编码方式使用此方法：Because of data formatting conflicts, using this method with the following encodings is not recommended: - UTF-7UTF-7 - ISO-2022-JPISO-2022-JP - ISCIIISCII 通用 I/O 任务的列表，请参阅[通用 I/O 任务](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). Unicode 代理项字符必须是作为写出对在相同的调用中，组合在一起不单独。Unicode surrogate characters must be written out as pairs together in the same call, not individually. 如果你需要对代理项对在你的应用程序的支持，请考虑使用的字符数组和方法重载。If you require support for surrogate pairs in your application, consider using a character array and the method overload. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何读取和写入内存使用作为后备存储的数据。The following code example shows how to read and write data using memory as a backing store. [!code-cpp[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWChar1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWChar1/CPP/rwchar.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWChar1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWChar1/CS/rwchar.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWChar1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWChar1/VB/rwchar.vb#1)]

is a single surrogate character.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 下表列出的其他典型或相关的 I/O 任务的示例。The following table lists examples of other typical or related I/O tasks. |若要执行此操作...To do this...|请参见本主题中的示例...See the example in this topic...| |-------------------|--------------------------------------| |创建文本文件。Create a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |写入文本文件。Write to a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |从文本文件中读取。Read from a text file.|[如何：从文件读取文本How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)| |将文本追加到文件。Append text to a file.|[如何：打开并追加到日志文件How to: Open and Append to a Log File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-open-and-append-to-a-log-file.md)



| |获取文件的大小。Get the size of a file.|| |获取文件特性。Get the attributes of a file.|| |设置文件的属性。Set the attributes of a file.|| |确定文件是否存在。Determine if a file exists.|| |从二进制文件读取。Read from a binary file.|[如何：对新建的数据文件进行读取和写入How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)| |写入二进制文件。Write to a binary file.|[如何：对新建的数据文件进行读取和写入How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何读取和写入内存使用作为后备存储的数据。The following code example shows how to read and write data using memory as a backing store. [!code-cpp[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWChars1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWChars1/CPP/rwchars.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWChars1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWChars1/CS/rwchars.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWChars1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWChars1/VB/rwchars.vb#1)]

span.span: is .
The stream is closed.
An I/O error occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void Write (decimal value);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Write(valuetype System.Decimal value) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub Write (value As Decimal)
public: virtual void Write(System::Decimal value);
abstract member Write : decimal -> unit override this.Write : decimal -> unit

param.name: value
param.span: 要写入的十进制值。

span.span: The decimal value to write.

summary.span: 将一个十进制值写入当前流，并将流位置提升十六个字节。

span.span: Writes a decimal value to the current stream and advances the stream position by sixteen bytes.

remarks.format:

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void Write (double value);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Write(float64 value) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub Write (value As Double)
public: virtual void Write(double value);
abstract member Write : double -> unit override this.Write : double -> unit

param.name: value
param.span: 要写入的 8 字节浮点值。

span.span: The eight-byte floating-point value to write.

summary.span: 将 8 字节浮点值写入当前流，并将流的位置提升 8 个字节。

span.span: Writes an eight-byte floating-point value to the current stream and advances the stream position by eight bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通用 I/O 任务的列表，请参阅[通用 I/O 任务](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何读取和写入`Double`数据写到使用的内存和`BinaryWriter`类的顶部类。The following code example shows how to read and write `Double` data to memory by using the and `BinaryWriter` classes on top of the class. `MemoryStream` 仅读取和写入`Byte`数据。`MemoryStream` only reads and writes `Byte` data. [!code-cpp[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWDouble#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWDouble/CPP/rwdouble.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWDouble#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWDouble/CS/rwdouble.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWDouble#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWDouble/VB/rwdouble.vb#1)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks `BinaryWriter` 将此数据类型存储在 little endian 格式。`BinaryWriter` stores this data type in little endian format. 下表列出的其他典型或相关的 I/O 任务的示例。The following table lists examples of other typical or related I/O tasks. |若要执行此操作...To do this...|请参见本主题中的示例...See the example in this topic...| |-------------------|--------------------------------------| |创建文本文件。Create a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |写入文本文件。Write to a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |从文本文件中读取。Read from a text file.|[如何：从文件读取文本How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)| |将文本追加到文件。Append text to a file.|[如何：打开并追加到日志文件How to: Open and Append to a Log File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-open-and-append-to-a-log-file.md)



| |获取文件的大小。Get the size of a file.|| |获取文件特性。Get the attributes of a file.|| |设置文件的属性。Set the attributes of a file.|| |确定文件是否存在。Determine if a file exists.|| |从二进制文件读取。Read from a binary file.|[如何：对新建的数据文件进行读取和写入How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)| |写入二进制文件。Write to a binary file.|[如何：对新建的数据文件进行读取和写入How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)|

[!code-csharp[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void Write (string value);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Write(string value) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub Write (value As String)
public: virtual void Write(System::String ^ value);
abstract member Write : string -> unit override this.Write : string -> unit

param.name: value
param.span: 要写入的值。

span.span: The value to write.

summary.span: 将有长度前缀的字符串按 的当前编码写入此流，并根据所使用的编码和写入流的特定字符，提升流的当前位置。

span.span: Writes a length-prefixed string to this stream in the current encoding of the , and advances the current position of the stream in accordance with the encoding used and the specific characters being written to the stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用编码时，此方法，首先将字符串的长度，写入以字节为单位，长度前缀意味着实例的当前编码到流。Length-prefixed means that this method first writes the length of the string, in bytes, when encoded with the instance's current encoding to the stream. 此值将记录为无符号整数。This value is written as an unsigned integer. 此方法然后将这些字节写入流。This method then writes that many bytes to the stream. 例如，"A"的字符串有长度为 1，但使用 utf-16; 编码长度是 2 个字节，因此编写的前缀中的值为 2，和 3 个字节写入到流，包括前缀。For example, the string "A" has a length of 1, but when encoded with UTF-16; the length is 2 bytes, so the value written in the prefix is 2, and 3 bytes are written to the stream, including the prefix. 通用 I/O 任务的列表，请参阅[通用 I/O 任务](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何存储和检索文件中的应用程序设置。The following code example demonstrates how to store and retrieve application settings in a file. [!code-csharp[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: An I/O error occurs.
is .
The stream is closed.

MemberSignature.Value: protected void Write7BitEncodedInt (int value);
.method familyhidebysig instance void Write7BitEncodedInt(int32 value) cil managed
Protected Sub Write7BitEncodedInt (value As Integer)
protected: void Write7BitEncodedInt(int value);
member this.Write7BitEncodedInt : int -> unit

param.name: value
param.span: 要写入的 32 位整数。

span.span: The 32-bit integer to be written.

summary.span: 以压缩格式写入 32 位整数。

span.span: Writes a 32-bit integer in a compressed format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 整数`value`参数形式写出的七位一次开头 7 的最低有效位。The integer of the `value` parameter is written out seven bits at a time, starting with the seven least-significant bits. 一个字节的高位该值指示是否存在要在此之后写入多个字节。The high bit of a byte indicates whether there are more bytes to be written after this one. 如果`value`可容纳在 7 位，它将仅使用一个字节的空间。If `value` will fit in seven bits, it takes only one byte of space. 如果`value`不适用于在 7 位，高位是设置的第一个字节，写出。`value`然后移动 7 位并下一步写入字节。If `value` will not fit in seven bits, the high bit is set on the first byte and written out. `value` is then shifted by seven bits and the next byte is written. 重复此过程，直到已写入的整个的整数。This process is repeated until the entire integer has been written. 通用 I/O 任务的列表，请参阅[通用 I/O 任务](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).

span.span: The end of the stream is reached.
The stream is closed.
The stream is closed.
